title: Guacamole
description: A traditional Mexican dip made from ripe avocados, lime juice, cilantro, onions, and jalapeños.
instructions: Mash the avocados in a bowl.
Add lime juice, cilantro, red onion, and finely chopped jalapeños.
Mix well and season with salt to taste.
Serve with tortilla chips or as a side dish.

title: Caprese Salad
description: A simple Italian salad made with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil.
instructions: Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: A classic Italian dish made with ground meat and tomato sauce.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a pan, cook onion and garlic until soft.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Pour in tomato sauce and simmer for 20 minutes.
